alert.note: Alert for Brown; Clay; Hendricks; Johnson; Marion; Monroe; Morgan; Owen; Putnam (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 4:23AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Monroe, Morgan, northwestern Johnson, northwestern Brown, southern Hendricks, northeastern Clay, northeastern Owen, southern Marion and southern Putnam Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 423 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles northeast of Greencastle to 11 miles southeast of Brazil. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Danville around 440 AM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Plainfield, Mooresville, Martinsville, Southport and Greenwood. This includes the following highways... Interstate 65 between mile markers 98 and 108. Interstate 70 between mile markers 26 and 74. Interstate 74 near mile marker 93, and between mile markers 96 and 98. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Clay; Hendricks; Johnson; Marion; Monroe; Morgan; Owen; Putnam
